website_summaries.verdict: The Master & Dynamic ME05 in-canal earphones deliver a rich, bass-forward sound signature in a stylish, luxurious design.
pros: Powerful audio performance with rich lows and sculpted highs
Ships with plenty of useful accessories, including multiple eartips and replaceable acoustic filters
cons: Sound signature might be too bass-forward for purists

customer_reviews.title: Failed longevity and unauthorized seller
customer_reviews.text: If you plan on buying these, do not do so from this seller. They are not an authorized dealer by the manufacturer so Master & Dynamic will NOT honor any warranty. After approximately 7 months of use and care, the microphone and toggle buttons have suddenly stopped working for me, the sound quality also seems to have decreased somewhat. The seller nor Master & Dynamic will take responsibility for the sudden loss of functionality. The sound quality, comfortability, and design of the actual earbuds are very nice but with the issues of actual longevity I can not recommend them. I would seek out other options and make sure that any seller is authorized by the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: vonda klein

customer_reviews.title: For price was impressed
customer_reviews.text: Nice design and sound quality; bass to mid-treble. I was surprised with the crisp and clear sound with a good seal to my ear blocking out external sound. My ears did get some fatigue after 1 hour of moderate loud listening with Oppo amplifier. Little concerned about the microphone tearing over repeated travel use/pack/unpack. Case not well deisgn, extreme bending of wires to put it in. Over the EAR headphone of B&O H6, B&W P7/P3, Audio Technica M50x, Sennheiser Momentum, Bose Sports, Jaybird X3, Audeze LCD2. For price it ranks behind B&W P3 and above audio technica. thanks
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Not really value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the cost I expected more. So the build quality is pretty good, The sound is what I would term as warm (nice). But the ear buds should be of better material and more size varieties, I actually have had to find other tips to use for a better fit. The jack seems not to fit securely into the socket, I am not sure if this is a quick release feature incase it gets caught on something (as this does not affect the sound). The carry pouch has the capacity to attaract stains and dirt tather quickly, and does make for easy use of storage as well.
customer_reviews.author: edmund aruofor

customer_reviews.title: Simply Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These earphones should be only considered superb..light, easy fit in the ear..immersive and the music seems to wrap around you...don’t hesitate; these are a incredible high value music device...try Leonard Cohen’s Thanks For The Dance with them..it’s as if he’s sitting next to you...
customer_reviews.author: david c leavitt

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: These are very well made headphones that sound great and feel like they'd last a long time but they have two large issues that make them worthless for anything but passive listening. 1. They don't stay in the ears. I've tried all the earbud sizes and none of them hold the earphones in place. In fact, as i'm writing this review I can feel them slowly slipping. It's a constant distraction. 2. Every bump on the cord can be heard through the earphones as a rustling sound.
customer_reviews.author: bmack

customer_reviews.title: Had good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Liked the product until the tip broke off from the jack/end Cost $300 - and now we cannot use it. Disappointed, warranty would not cover it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, low quality sound
customer_reviews.text: I DJ for a living and consider myself a thoroughbred audiophile. These are highly overpriced and do not have near sound quality as the SHURE 215's. Sent these back and shall rock on with the better sounding, much lower priced SHURE brand headphones !
customer_reviews.author: Chad Eldridge

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I had been searching for a wired solution that sounds great, is well made, and is also reasonably priced. These earphones checked all the boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Terrones

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic in ear headphones. Best I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic earphones. Best sound I have ever heard. The brass gives them a warm, wonderful sound. I highly reccomend them!
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Lee

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful piece, not for daily use
customer_reviews.text: For the money, it is difficult to justify the sound quality (at least to my ears). Also, the construction is delicate, not poor quality, just delicate. These headphones therefore are certainly useless for activities such as going to the gym. I would not recommend using these for anything but listening in a very controlled environment in order to protect the fragile cable. If these were in the sub 100 price range, I would have much better sentiments towards them. However, as stated before, I find that these headphones are not especially practical (for my use), and the sound quality can be found and exceeded at lower price points.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These earbuds look great, sound great
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds look great, sound great, and fit great. They are a little on the heavy side being made of brass, but that's to be expected. If you're on the fence about the earbuds, read the Engadget article linked below, where the reviewer says these may be the best earbuds he's ever tried. Honestly the only reason not to buy them is price - $200 is steep for earbuds, but you get what you pay for. [...]
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful earphones
customer_reviews.text: Excellent earphones, true soundstage when listening to music. Love these earphones!
customer_reviews.author: C. C.

customer_reviews.title: Solid built headphone with a nice rich/brassy tone
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned, you do get some cord vibration that works its way into the sound if you are walking or bumping the cord around. If you're just sitting on the couch or meditating to music, you should have no problems with these. They also stay put in my ears — no problem with the weight of the brass. Well done M&D!
customer_reviews.author: André

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these. I had to return my first pair because they crapped out. The mic stopped working and then the sound wouldn't hold. What do you know exact same thing with the second pair. Just had the left ear go out on pair 2, these are trash.
customer_reviews.author: Dgimbz

customer_reviews.title: Which is odd considering how easy it is to loose them
customer_reviews.text: I'd give it 5 stars but they do not offer ear tip replacements! Which is odd considering how easy it is to loose them.
customer_reviews.author: FofA

customer_reviews.title: ... these headphones - sound quality and fit are very poor. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of these headphones - sound quality and fit are very poor. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: P.H

customer_reviews.title: excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Very solid build and clear, excellent sound quality. Also, packaging is second to none.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! incredible​
customer_reviews.text: WOW !!!! Just listening to Fanfare to the common Man but Copeland .... WOW!!! WOW!!! Wow!!!! Amazing! incredible​ !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Probably my favorite earphones so far but...
customer_reviews.text: I love these earphones as the sound is amazing when they stay in my ears. I have tried every size of the included ear pieces and none of them keep the earphones in my ears. The are very comfortable and would be great to sleep in as well since they dont stick out very much if they stayed in my ears. That is really my only complaint. Build quality is great. They look great. Just wish I could use them. If these kind of earbud stay in your ears I would definitely recommend them. I just had to push them in constantly which has kept me from even enjoying them.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Mistich

customer_reviews.title: Just Average Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I received these headphones as a gift. I never would have paid for headphones this expensive. The headphones look nice, and the brass material feels solid. However they don't sound premium to me, and there is no noise canceling. These would be good headphones for someone that cares about the appearance of wearing expensive looking headphones. Personally, I would rather purchase active noise canceling headphones that cost half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: THESE BROKE SO EASILY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good. the bass is smooth, treble is clear. They sit perfectly in ear, the weight balance is brilliant. I love these earphones. BUT THEY BROKE SO EASILY. Sound loss to right hand side just after one month of mild use; M&D sent me a replacement, but same problem appeared after another two months (FYI I used those max 3 hours per day only when commuting; put them in my bag for rest of the day.) Very disappointing, will not buy anything from this company anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Just great mix of everything 4me...
customer_reviews.text: I really believe no one should spend more than 100-150$ for in ear headphones, this is perfect example you can get Amazing quality for that amount of money.... I am not into all that lingo mids high bass or whatever but i love to use my headphones. So far the best for my taste... Very well built sound is just pleasure to listen. But i have Astell&Kern player make different plus n8ce pair of headphones.... Can't go wrong....
customer_reviews.author: Boston

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Yeah there're nice but break a lot. Also the ear pieces (is that how you call them?) fall off super easy after a few months of use and can even get stuck in your ear. Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Highly don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: The most uncomfortable headphones I have ever used! They absolutely don't for to your ears, sounds is very bad. Because I paid a lot of money I kept using them until it broke in about 6 months..
customer_reviews.author: Nurcan

customer_reviews.title: Un-usable
customer_reviews.text: While the sound quality is good, it makes no difference. These things are basically stethoscopes. Unless you stay perfectly still, all you can hear is the sound of the moving cord loudly reverberating like a drum through your ear. Can't use at the gym, when walking or running, etc.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Volume Rocker not Compatible on Android Marshmallow
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get these headphones, but the volume up/down buttons don't seem to be compatible with Android Marshmallow 6.0.1 (?). At least they don't seem to work with my Samsung S7 Edge for the moment. Bummer, as these have an amazing look and feel to them - quality all around. I would've been willing to let this little annoyance slide, but at this price point, it's rather unacceptable. The play/pause/skip button does work, however. These were probably designed with Apple's i-phone/pad/whatever in mind, not android. Really too bad, would've loved to use these day-to-day.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

product_meta.title: Master & Dynamic ME05 In Ear Headphone - Brass
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:BrassMANUFACTURER'S DESCRIPTION


ME05 EARPHONES

Precision-machined from solid brass, palladium coated and hand-finished, Master & Dynamic's ME05 Earphones feature a distinctive form with ergonomic and elegant details, including laser etching and mirrored accents that reflect light.

ME05 Earphones utilize custom drivers for superb sound quality and a balanced weight distribution that ensures a snug, comfortable fit.

...Top-shelf sound, supreme comfort, dramatic isolation, excellent craftsmanship. - Wired

Big, brassy, ballsy-that's the aesthetic New York-based Master & Dynamic chose for its new high-end earbuds. - The Wall Street Journal

...the ME05 earphones... play to their strengths of unparalleled craftsmanship, superior aesthetic design, and first-class audio capabilities. - Highsnobiety



BOX CONTAINS
ME05 In Ear Headphone - Brass
feature_bullets: Solid brass body provides superior acoustic properties
Four sizes silicone ear tips included
Tangle resistant rubber cables with oxygen-free copper
Separated mic and remote with tactile silicone buttons
